t: Who Shall Dwell on Your Holy Hill?
O*pn Lord,*s who shall sojourn in your tent? Who*ld shall dwell on your holy hill?
He*pn who walks blamelessly and does what is right and*ld speaks truth in his heart;
who*ln does not slander with his tongue and*ld does no evil to his neighbor, nor*ld takes up a reproach against his friend;
in*ln whose eyes a vile person is despised, but*ld who honors those who fear the Lord;*s who*ln swears to his own hurt and does not change;
who*ln does not put out his money at interest and*ld does not take a bribe against the innocent. He*ln who does these things shall never be moved.
